== Nellipoyil (627411) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Nellipoyil is a village in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 4731 hectares and harbouring 2725 households with total population of 11014 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 55 km. Male population is 5461 and female population is 5553. Scheduled Caste Population is 439 and Scheduled Tribes population is 219. Census Location Code of the village is 627411<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 9607 (87.23%)
* Literate male population: 4773 (87.4%)
* Literate female population: 4834 (87.05%)
